concept.title: Create a Local Test Environment with an Agent

conbody.p: An Agent manages a local server for executing the scheduled Test Runs in a Local Test Environment.
Katalon TestOps supports compatible Agents for different executing environments.
Once you install the Agent in your local test machine, you have created a Local Test Environment for Test Runs execution.

li.p: You can share the Agents among Users and Projects within a Team.
